events.message: We have received your application for the software engineer position and appreciate your interest in joining our engineering team.
Your application has been categorised under the engineering department for further review by our technical recruitment team.
A recruiter specializing in software engineering roles has been assigned to your application and will be reaching out soon.
We completed an initial screening call to discuss your background and technical skills related to the engineering position.
Thank you for your prompt response and confirmation to proceed with the technical interview next week.
Your technical interview has been scheduled for 2024-05-09 at 10:00 AM UTC with our lead developer.
The technical interview was successfully completed. Our panel commended your problem-solving skills and coding proficiency.
Your HR interview has been scheduled for 2024-05-12 at 2:00 PM UTC to discuss company culture and benefits.
You successfully completed the HR interview, and we are pleased to discuss the next steps in the hiring process.
An official offer has been proposed to you outlining the terms and compensation for the software engineer position.
We have received your feedback expressing enthusiasm for the offer and readiness to join our engineering team.
You have accepted our job offer. We are excited to welcome you aboard as a new member of our engineering department.
Your onboarding process has officially started. You will receive resources and support to get you up to speed quickly.
The hiring process has been successfully closed. Congratulations on joining our engineering team, we look forward to your contributions.
